name: Darkenedages
tagline: A twister-based game of intrigue and bad crypto
body:
![Trust ██ like █████. Be ███████.](https://i.imgur.com/WfhHOX0.jpg)

### News
* Pull, and you can [run](https://github.com/Knights-of-Redact/DarkenedAges#unredacting-a-message)
  `./unredact.py` without arguments for a summary of your darkive.
* We're in rehearsal mode now, and [this](https://twisterio.com/post/thedod/1960) was the first move.
* We've reached critical mass (5 players) \o/

### In general
* [README](https://github.com/Knights-of-Redact/DarkenedAges/#readme)
* [Wiki](* Problems? Questions? DM `@darkenedages` on [Twister](http://twister.net.co))
* See player list (and some examples of redactions etc.) [here](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Knights-of-Redact/DarkenedAges/master/output.txt).
* For public moves and gossip, see [#DarkenedAges](https://twisterio.com/search?kw=%23darkenedages) on [twister](http://twister.net.co).
* Problems? Questions? DM `@darkenedages` on [Twister](http://twister.net.co).

> It ain't home, but it's much

— [Johnny nemo](http://www.thrillingdetective.com/nemo.html), [Strange Days](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Milligan#Early_work)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
